short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save More at your Favourite Brands

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ALADY is a female centric promotion and coupon marketplace where the modern and empowered woman like you can select the best deals from over thousand of brands.Bringing together all the promotions in Singapore right on the palm of your hand. From beauty and spa, shopping and dining down to entertainment, we got everything covered. 
Acting like a lady and shopping like a queen is easy with ALADY!

With ALADY Chrome Extension , you can :

  * Easily discover Thousands over brands and promotions or coupon codes.
  * Never miss a promotion again.
  * Get notified for great promotions.
  * Nice and simple interface.
  * Easily save and share promotions or coupon codes.
  * Wait... there's more! You will get surprise rewards too!

Check out https://www.alady.sg/chrome
Any feedback or question please email us at hello@alady.sg
